title: Stable But Very High Ping (Midwest USA)
body:
Normally I have a ping of 20ms as I am lucky enough to live as close to the servers as I do.

At about 1am Central Time my 20ms changed to a stable 95ms. The ping is not spiking, no packets are being lost. Nothing I have been able to do on my end has brought down the ping whatsoever. My internet provider is AT&T and I have never had issues with this in the past and have been playing League well before the server change.

I'm wondering if anybody else in the Midwest region is running into issues like this. If this is not a problem on my end or Riot's end then I can only guess that my isp has lost the normal route it connects to the servers by.

replies.body: This currently an issue with ATT that's causing some higher ping for players.  Check their support site for your specific area to see if there are any updates, otherwise I'll try and post updates if any come my way.  Let me know if that clears things up!

I am having the same issue with ATT high ping on LOL NA servers. I average about 52 ms ping and get some spikes that for 400+. Ping to other sites like Google are consistent 25ms. I have played on LOL NA server with Verizon network and get 20+ms ping while playing at two different homes with ATT I always get 50+ms with frequent lag spikes.

I have the exact same problem! Ahhh I live in Missouri and have AT&T what the heck is the deal!?
Same issue here as well as my Ohio buddy.  Both At&t.

I'm having this exact same issue! was a solid 47-50 ping pre-patch and now suddenly a solid 91-92
Rio plz ;-;
Yup, same problem and using at&t. Guess we just have to wait on a fix from them. Don't bother calling anyone, you know how that goes.
I have the exact same issue. I live in Ohio and usually have 32 ping. As of February 28, 2017 my ping randomly increased to a stable 98. I also have AT&T and never had any issues until yesterday.

From reading other threads I can tell you that other players who also have AT&T are having the same issues. I have optimum and play on a Macbook Air and I'm also experience ping issues that are causing me to lag while in game. We're going to have to wait for Riot to answer to us to see what the actual problem is. Here's the thread I made about the situation: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/sBMf0K0v-74-patch-random-lag-spikes
